trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chesterfield
There were no other sightings in Chesterfield on or around November 16th 1980
Summary: quite moving object , triangle shaped red , green and yellow in colour
divs: sighting detailsit happend just over 30 years ago around 1980 the wife and i was walking the dog in hollymoorside in chesterfield , derbyshire when suddenly the dog refused to go any further , he just froze . on looking over too our right the wife and i observed a glowing object moving left to right it was triangle shaped with 3 distinctive colours red , green and yellow . said object moved slowly to our right as it did this we ran back to my wifes mothers approx 1\2 mile away where her mum , dad and sister all observed said object . the object then hovered above a farm house approx 1 mile in the distance , where a smaller object with the same colours seemed to come out from the larger shape and descend and hover above a farm house for approx 5 mins . it the rejoined the larger object and moved of very slowly to our left . in all this time no other aircraft was seen in the area , the object made no sound so you could rule out aircraft , helicopters ect . a few months later the wife and i telling my father in laws neighbour what we saw and to our suprise he told us he saw the same thing a couple of miles away from where we was . its difficult to recal everything after all this time but feel free to contact me and if possible send further info if required .
